item.title: First thoughts of the HTC Vive
item.description:
First thoughts of the HTC Vive

,

Well today is the day: I’ve finally received my HTC Vive VR system in the mail. This really is an amazing device. I'm blown away at how far VR since the days of the Oculus Rift DK1.

item.title: GeniPass
item.description:
,

GeniPass

,

An Android password manager that lets you manage your passwords across devices without storing them on the device or on a server.

item.title: Safely Generating Cryptographically Secure Random Numbers With Swift
item.description:
Safely Generating Cryptographically Secure Random Numbers With Swift

,

We’ll take a look at how safely generate cryptographically secure random bytes as an array of bytes, an UInt, or as a hexadecimal string.
